name: Keiba Saisho no Housoku '97 Vol. II: To Hit
overview: Keiba Saishou no Housoku '97 Vol. II - To Hit is the fourth game in the Keiba Saisho series for the Playstation console. In the game the player can only go through different stats of horses, places & jockeys. the game is heavy on japanese text, so only people that can fully understand japanese will like this game.
